name: Barbell Bench Press
description: A compound chest exercise targeting the pectorals, triceps, and front deltoids.
tips: Keep your shoulder blades retracted.
Lower the bar to mid-chest.
Drive through your heels.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Targets the lats and upper back.
tips: Pull the bar to your upper chest.
Avoid using momentum.
Control the negative.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: A horizontal pulling exercise that targets the middle back and lats.
tips: Keep your back straight and chest up.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end.
Avoid leaning too far back.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
description: Targets the lats and rhomboids with an emphasis on unilateral strength.
tips: Keep your torso stable and don't twist.
Pull with your elbow, not your hand.
Lower the weight slowly.

name: Face Pulls
description: A shoulder and upper back exercise focused on the rear deltoids and traps.
tips: Use a rope attachment and pull towards your forehead.
Keep elbows high and wide.
Pause briefly at the peak contraction.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
description: An isolation exercise targeting the biceps.
tips: Keep your elbows close to your sides.
Avoid swinging the weights.
Squeeze at the top of the curl.

name: Cable Rope Hammer Curls
description: Targets the biceps and brachialis using a neutral grip.
tips: Use a rope attachment and keep wrists neutral.
Avoid using your shoulders to lift.
Control both the lift and the descent.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: A compound chest exercise that also targets shoulders and triceps.
tips: Lower dumbbells to chest level slowly.
Keep elbows at about a 45-degree angle.
Press evenly with both arms.

name: Machine Incline Chest Press
description: Focuses on the upper chest and anterior deltoids.
tips: Adjust the seat so handles are at chest height.
Avoid locking your elbows at the top.
Push through your palms, not fingers.

name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Targets the front and side deltoids while stabilizing the core.
tips: Start with dumbbells at ear level.
Avoid arching your lower back.
Press up in a straight line.

name: Cable Lateral Raises
description: An isolation exercise for the lateral deltoids.
tips: Raise the cable to shoulder height.
Keep a slight bend in the elbow.
Avoid shrugging your traps.

name: Tricep Pushdowns
description: An isolation movement for the triceps using a rope or straight bar.
tips: Keep your elbows locked at your sides.
Extend fully at the bottom.
Avoid using momentum or leaning forward.

name: Dumbbell Skullcrushers
description: Targets the long head of the triceps during elbow extension.
tips: Lower the dumbbells slowly to the sides of your head.
Keep upper arms stationary.
Don’t let the elbows flare out.

name: Dumbbell Goblet Squats
description: A front-loaded squat variation targeting the quads, glutes, and core.
tips: Keep chest upright and dumbbell close to your body.
Push knees out as you descend.
Drive through the heels to stand up.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlifts
description: A hip-hinge movement that targets hamstrings and glutes.
tips: Keep a slight bend in the knees.
Lower dumbbells slowly down the front of your legs.
Maintain a flat back throughout.

name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squats
description: Unilateral lower body exercise that targets glutes, quads, and hamstrings.
tips: Keep your front foot flat and knee aligned.
Lower until your back knee nearly touches the ground.
Push through the heel of the front foot.

name: Leg Curl Machine
description: An isolation exercise focusing on the hamstrings.
tips: Adjust the pad to rest just above the heels.
Squeeze at the top of the curl.
Control the weight back down.

name: Leg Extension Machine
description: Isolates the quadriceps through knee extension.
tips: Adjust the seat so your knees align with the pivot.
Fully extend and squeeze the quads.
Avoid locking out the knees forcefully.

name: Cable Glute Kickbacks
description: Targets the gluteus maximus in a hip extension movement.
tips: Use an ankle strap and maintain balance.
Kick straight back, not up.
Squeeze your glutes at the top.

name: Calf Raises
description: Targets the gastrocnemius and soleus muscles of the calves.
tips: Perform full range of motion.
Pause at the top for a stronger contraction.
Keep knees slightly bent if needed.

name: V Ups
description: Targets the core.
tips: Start lying flat on back.
Raise feet and hands to meet eachother.
Slowly decline hands and feet back to ground.

name: Russian Twists
description: Targets the core.
tips: Lift feet and back slightly off the ground.
Touch the floor, alternating the side each time.

name: Cable Crossovers
description: An isolation chest exercise targeting the inner pectorals.
tips: Start with cables high and arms outstretched.
Bring hands together in front of you with a slight bend in elbows.
Squeeze the chest at the peak.

name: Chin Up
description: A bodyweight pulling exercise emphasizing the lats and biceps.
tips: Use an underhand grip.
Pull your chest to the bar.
Control the descent.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound lift that targets the posterior chain.
tips: Keep your back flat and bar close to your body.
Drive through your heels.
Lock out at the top by squeezing glutes.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
description: Targets the lower abdominals and hip flexors.
tips: Hang from a pull-up bar with straight arms.
Raise legs to at least 90 degrees.
Avoid swinging.

name: Hip Thrusts
description: Targets the glutes with emphasis on hip extension.
tips: Place upper back on a bench and feet flat on the ground.
Drive through your heels and squeeze at the top.
Avoid hyperextending your lower back.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral lower body movement targeting glutes, quads, and hamstrings.
tips: Keep torso upright.
Step forward and lower until both knees are at 90 degrees.
Push through the front heel to return.

name: Plank
description: An isometric exercise targeting the core.
tips: Maintain a straight line from head to heels.
Keep your core tight.
Don’t let hips sag or pike.

name: Preacher Curls
description: Isolation movement targeting the biceps with arm support.
tips: Keep upper arms fixed against the pad.
Lower the bar slowly.
Squeeze at the top.

name: Pull Up
description: A compound pulling movement targeting the back and arms.
tips: Use a shoulder-width overhand grip.
Pull your chin above the bar.
Control the descent.

name: Push Ups
description: A bodyweight pressing movement targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
tips: Keep your body in a straight line.
Lower chest to the ground.
Push through palms to return.

name: Reverse Curls
description: Targets the brachialis and forearms using a pronated grip.
tips: Use an overhand grip.
Keep elbows at your sides.
Curl without swinging.

name: Standing Cable Curls
description: An isolation exercise for biceps with constant tension.
tips: Keep elbows stationary.
Curl with control.
Squeeze at the top of the movement.

name: Front Dumbbell Squat
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, glutes, and core by holding dumbbells at shoulder height.
tips: Hold the dumbbells at shoulder level with elbows pointing slightly forward.
Keep your chest up and core engaged throughout the movement.
Squat down until your thighs are at least parallel to the floor, then drive through your heels to stand up.

name: Dumbbell Incline Press
description: A compound pressing movement performed on an incline bench to target the upper chest and shoulders.
tips: Set the bench to a 30–45° incline.
Press the dumbbells upward without letting them touch.
Lower slowly until your elbows are just below the bench line.

name: Front Raises
description: An isolation exercise that targets the front deltoids by lifting the weights in front of the body.
tips: Keep a slight bend in your elbows.
Raise the weights to shoulder height.
Avoid swinging your torso — control each rep.

name: Overhead Tricep Extensions
description: An isolation movement focusing on the long head of the triceps by extending the arms overhead.
tips: Keep your elbows close to your head.
Lower the weight slowly behind your head.
Fully extend your arms at the top for a strong contraction.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: An isolation exercise that targets the lateral deltoids to build wider, stronger shoulders.
tips: Keep a slight bend in your elbows throughout the movement.
Raise your arms until they are parallel to the floor.
Avoid shrugging or using momentum — control the lift and lower slowly.

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Reverse Fly
description: An isolation exercise that targets the rear deltoids and upper back by moving the arms outward in a bent-over position.
tips: Keep a slight bend in your elbows throughout the movement.
Maintain a flat back and neutral spine.
Raise the dumbbells until your arms are parallel to the floor, then lower them slowly.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
description: A simple but effective exercise that strengthens and builds the trapezius muscles by elevating the shoulders.
tips: Hold the dumbbells at your sides with straight arms.
Lift your shoulders straight up toward your ears.
Pause briefly at the top, then lower slowly without rolling your shoulders.

name: Barbell Rows
description: A compound pulling exercise that targets the lats, upper back, and lower back while also engaging the biceps.
tips: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder width.
Hinge at the hips and keep your back flat with chest up.
Pull the bar towards your lower ribs while squeezing your shoulder blades.
Lower the bar under control to full arm extension.

name: Barbell Shoulder Press
description: A compound pressing exercise targeting the front and side delts while also engaging the triceps and upper chest.
tips: Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Keep your core tight and avoid arching your lower back.
Press the bar overhead until arms are fully extended.
Lower with control to just below chin level.

name: Decline Sit-Ups
description: An abdominal exercise that increases resistance by positioning the torso below hip height.
tips: Secure your feet at the top of the decline bench.
Lower yourself slowly until your back is nearly parallel to the bench.
Crunch up while keeping tension in your core.
Avoid pulling your neck with your hands.

name: Barbell Romanian Deadlifts
description: A hip-hinge exercise that targets the hamstrings and glutes while strengthening the lower back.
tips: Stand with feet hip-width apart and grip the bar just outside your legs.
Hinge at the hips while keeping a slight bend in the knees.
Lower the bar down the thighs until you feel a hamstring stretch.
Drive hips forward and squeeze glutes to return to standing.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: A compound lower-body exercise targeting the quads, glutes, and hamstrings while developing overall leg strength.
tips: Place the bar across your upper traps and keep your chest up.
Squat by driving knees out and hips back simultaneously.
Keep your feet flat and maintain a neutral spine.
Drive through your heels to stand tall.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based compound exercise that targets the quadriceps with support for the lower back and hips.
tips: Place feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Lower the sled under control until knees reach 90 degrees.
Avoid letting your lower back round.
Drive through your mid-foot and extend without locking your knees.

name: EZ Bar Skullcrushers
description: An isolation tricep exercise that targets the long head by lowering an EZ bar toward the forehead or behind the head.
tips: Lie flat on a bench and grip the EZ bar on the angled handles.
Keep upper arms steady and let elbows travel slightly back as you lower the bar.
Lower the bar to your forehead or just behind your head for a deeper stretch.
Extend your arms fully without locking out hard at the top.
